title: Elicitation
description: Allows MCP servers to request additional information from users during execution

notes.1: JetBrains AI Assistant only supports stdio - cannot connect to remote MCP servers
notes.2: New in June 2025 spec - client support still rolling out

vscode+github-copilot.evidence: Elicitation explicitly listed in the MCP supported features section of the documentation.

visual-studio+github-copilot.evidence: GitHub Copilot MCP support applies across IDEs including Visual Studio. Elicitation mentioned in VS Code docs.

jetbrains+github-copilot.evidence: GitHub Copilot MCP support applies across IDEs. Elicitation mentioned in VS Code docs.

xcode+github-copilot.evidence: GitHub Copilot Xcode elicitation - support status unknown.

android-studio+github-copilot.evidence: GitHub Copilot MCP support applies across IDEs including Android Studio. Elicitation mentioned in VS Code docs.

neovim+github-copilot.evidence: GitHub Copilot MCP support not available for Neovim.

emacs+github-copilot.evidence: GitHub Copilot MCP support not available for Emacs.

vscode+cline.evidence: Not mentioned in documentation. Docs only list tools, resources, and prompts as supported MCP features.

jetbrains+cline.evidence: Cline uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Elicitation not mentioned in docs.

android-studio+cline.evidence: Cline uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Elicitation not mentioned in docs.

vscode+continue.evidence: Not mentioned in documentation. Only tools, resources, prompts discussed. Sampling explicitly unsupported.

jetbrains+continue.evidence: Continue uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Elicitation not mentioned in docs.

android-studio+continue.evidence: Continue uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Elicitation not mentioned in docs.

vscode+cody.evidence: Not mentioned. Changelog only confirms tools support. PulseMCP only lists resources.

jetbrains+cody.evidence: Cody uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Elicitation not mentioned in docs.

visual-studio+cody.evidence: Cody uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Elicitation not mentioned in docs.

android-studio+cody.evidence: Cody uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Elicitation not mentioned in docs.

jetbrains+tabnine.evidence: Tabnine uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Elicitation not mentioned in docs.

visual-studio+tabnine.evidence: Tabnine uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Elicitation not mentioned in docs.

android-studio+tabnine.evidence: Tabnine uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Elicitation not mentioned in docs.

neovim+tabnine.evidence: Elicitation not mentioned in Tabnine MCP docs.

vscode+codeium.evidence: No MCP support in Codeium VS Code extension. MCP is only available in Windsurf IDE, Codeium's standalone product.

jetbrains+codeium.evidence: No MCP support in Codeium JetBrains extension. MCP is only in Windsurf IDE.

neovim+codeium.evidence: No MCP support in Codeium Neovim plugin. MCP is only in Windsurf IDE.

android-studio+codeium.evidence: No MCP support in Codeium Android Studio extension. MCP is only available in Windsurf IDE.

vscode+amazonq.evidence: Not mentioned in documentation. Docs only cover tools, prompts, and resources.

jetbrains+amazonq.evidence: Amazon Q uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Elicitation not mentioned in docs.

visual-studio+amazonq.evidence: Amazon Q uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Elicitation not mentioned in docs.

android-studio+amazonq.evidence: Amazon Q uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Elicitation not mentioned in docs.

cursor+native.evidence: Elicitation explicitly listed as supported: 'Server-initiated requests for additional information from users'

windsurf+native.evidence: Elicitation not supported per Frontend Masters course: 'Windsurf supports resources, prompts and tools, but does not support sampling, roots or elicitation.'

zed+native.evidence: Not mentioned in documentation. Zed MCP support focuses on tools with partial prompts support.

zed+claude-code.evidence: Uses Claude Code's MCP implementation. Claude Code supports elicitation via AskUserQuestion tool.

zed+codex-cli.evidence: Unknown - Codex CLI MCP documentation does not specify elicitation support.

jetbrains+native.evidence: Not mentioned in documentation. JetBrains AI Assistant MCP docs only describe tools support.

neovim+avante.evidence: Not mentioned in documentation. Only tools, resources, and prompts discussed.

neovim+codecompanion.evidence: Not mentioned. Docs only cover tools, resources, and prompts.

neovim+amp.evidence: Elicitation support unknown in Amp MCP docs.

neovim+augment.evidence: Elicitation support unknown in Augment MCP docs.

emacs+gptel.evidence: Elicitation not mentioned in gptel docs.

emacs+ellama.evidence: Ellama does not have MCP support.

claude-desktop+native.evidence: Claude Desktop is Anthropic's native MCP implementation. Elicitation supported.

claude-code+native.evidence: Claude Code elicitation not supported - uses AskUserQuestion tool instead of MCP elicitation.

codex-cli+native.evidence: Codex CLI elicitation support unknown per OpenAI MCP documentation.

gemini-cli+native.evidence: Gemini CLI does not support elicitation per documentation.

void+native.evidence: MCP support status unknown - no clear documentation found for Void Editor MCP integration.

pearai+native.evidence: MCP support status unknown - no clear documentation found for PearAI MCP integration.

firebase-studio+native.evidence: MCP support status unknown - Firebase Studio is new Google product, no MCP documentation found.

jules+native.evidence: MCP support status unknown - Jules is Google's async coding agent, no MCP documentation found.

lovable+native.evidence: Lovable MCP elicitation support unknown - docs focus on connectors.

xcode+native.evidence: No MCP support - Xcode has no built-in MCP integration.

android-studio+native.evidence: MCP support status unknown - Android Studio Gemini integration, MCP via third-party plugins.

vscode+amp.evidence: Amp MCP elicitation support unknown - docs focus on tools.

jetbrains+amp.evidence: Amp MCP elicitation support unknown - docs focus on tools.

neovim+amp.evidence: Amp MCP elicitation support unknown - docs focus on tools.

amp+native.evidence: Amp MCP elicitation support unknown - docs focus on tools.

vscode+augment.evidence: Augment MCP elicitation support unknown - docs focus on tools.

jetbrains+augment.evidence: Augment MCP elicitation support unknown - docs focus on tools.

neovim+augment.evidence: Augment MCP elicitation support unknown - docs focus on tools.

vscode+gemini-code-assist.evidence: MCP support status unknown - Gemini Code Assist MCP documentation not clearly found.

jetbrains+gemini-code-assist.evidence: MCP support status unknown - Gemini Code Assist MCP documentation not clearly found.

android-studio+gemini-code-assist.evidence: MCP support status unknown - Gemini Code Assist MCP documentation not clearly found.
